Text: Devon County War Memorial:  It is one of fifteen War Crosses designed by Lutyens to a similar specification, and one of two to serve as a civic memorial in a city.

<Text: Devon County War Memorial:  After considering multiple proposals, the Devon County War Memorial Committee commissioned Lutyens to design a War Cross instead.>
